domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
FYI: President Trump is donating his salary for this quarter to the Department of Health and Human Services for research on treatments of the COVID-19 disease.

The president regularly donates his quarterly salary to various efforts in government.

annotations.normalized_text: Department of Health and Human Services
